TEXT.TITLE: INDEPENDENT AIR <IAIR> EXTENDS WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: Independent Air Inc said its board has extended the expiration of its Class A warrants to June 30 from April 11 and left the exercise price unchanged at 18 cts per common share. Reuter
